Parameters: String: the algorithm name for the message digest used in this mask generation function MGF1.
MGF1ParameterSpec(java.lang.String).Description: Constructs a parameter set for mask generation function MGF1 as defined in the PKCS #1 standard.

Returns: the algorithm name of the message digest.
getDigestAlgorithm().Description: Returns the algorithm name of the message digest used by the mask generation function.
